title: Remote Virtual Assistant (Bookkeeping & Spreadsheet Support)
job_overview:
We’re seeking a highly detail-oriented and reliable Virtual Assistant to join our growing global team. This full-time remote role is ideal for someone with a background in bookkeeping or accounting, who thrives in a spreadsheet-heavy, process-driven environment.

If you love organizing numbers, updating systems, and keeping everything running smoothly behind the scenes—this role is for you.

Key Responsibilities
- Update numbers and financial records in QuickBooks Desktop and QuickBooks Online
- Maintain and update various tracking spreadsheets (Google Sheets/Excel)
- Assist with payroll preparation and ensure accuracy
- Support invoicing, billing, and reconciliation tasks
- Organize data for reporting and internal review
- Communicate with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers through Slack, email, and occasional Microsoft Teams calls

Software Tools
- QuickBooks (both desktop and online)
- Google sheets
- Slack, email, MS teams

Requirements
- 2+ years of experience in bookkeeping or accounting roles
- Strong working knowledge of spreadsheets (formulas, data entry, organization)
- Excellent written English skills (fluency required)
- Own computer with a stable internet connection
- Second monitor highly recommended for efficiency
- Strong attention to detail, organizational skills, and ability to self-manage tasks and deadlines

Hours and Availability
- Full-time (40 hours/week)
- Must be available during standard U.S. Eastern Time (EST) business hours
- Remote work from anywhere is welcome—as long as you're punctual, responsive, and committed during EST hours

Why Join Us?
We are a supportive and fast-moving team that values clear communication and trust. You'll have the chance to make a real impact and grow in your role over time. We’re looking for someone who takes pride in accurate work and loves organizing behind the scenes.
